greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of noncrossing partitions of an n-set up to rotation with all blocks having a prime number of elements.
comment: The number of such noncrossing partitions counted distinctly is given by A210737.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
program: (PARI) \\ number of partitions with restricted block sizes
my(T=sum(k=1, #v, my(t=v[k]); if(t, x^k*t*sumdiv(k, d, eulerphi(d) * varpow(p,d)^(k/d))/k)));
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, May 01 2018
